I'm not that concerned with looking my best.
i like to play outside.
I listen to Bruno Mars' music and reminisce about the good times I had playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger.
I enjoy running and skateboarding to stay active and clear my head.
I run every day because I want to be healthy and set a good example for my younger sibling.

content.text: Hi, I'm [name]. What's your name?
Hi [name], I'm [name].
I'm a college student, and I love to run. What do you do for fun?
I like to play video games and read.
I don't really play video games, but I love to read. What's your favorite book?
I don't really have a favorite book, but I like to read biographies and historical fiction.
I like to read biographies too. What do you like about them?
I like to learn about other people's lives and see how they've made their way in the world.
Me too. I think it's interesting to see how people have overcome adversity and achieved their goals.
Yeah, it's inspiring.
Do you have any goals that you're working towards right now?
I'm trying to finish my degree and get a good job.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I hope so.
What do you think you'll do after you graduate?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to graduate school.
That sounds like a good plan.
Yeah, I think so too.
Well, I'm glad I met you. It was nice talking to you.
It was nice talking to you too. Have a good day.
You too.
